channel.title: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers Blog

item.title: Introducing Emitbase ðŸ”¥
item.description: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers. It allows you to connect to a database, define the logic of alerts in SQL, and specify channels for alerts (Email or Slack).
item.content:encoded: Emitbase is an open-source alerts platform for developers. It allows you to connect to a database, define the logic of alerts in SQL, and specify channels for alerts (Email or Slack).
